items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task status changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by a user, all other users see the change within 2 seconds.
Task updates are reflected without requiring a manual page refresh.
non_functional: System must handle at least 500 concurrent users without performance degradation
Updates must have latency under 2 seconds

items.title: Shared Task Boards
items.description: Provide a shared visual board where team members can create, assign, and track tasks.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create new tasks with title, description, assignee, and due date.
Tasks can be moved between columns representing different statuses.
non_functional: Board interface must load in under 3 seconds
Support for at least 1000 tasks per board without UI lag

notes: User input was high-level; assumed core collaboration features include real-time updates and shared boards. Additional features like chat, notifications, and integrations may be required in future iterations.
